data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
UserAgent Profiles are XML-files describing the characteristics of
    mobile-phones. It can be used to find out how to server wap or xhtml
    to their browsers, to find out what types of ring-tones they are
    able to play, ... The URL to the Profile is given via the
    HTTP-Headers of their browsers requests, so i think, it is placed
    right with CGI::Mobile::UAProf, it also could be named CGI::UAProf,
    i don't mind.
